question: Write a letter to your local council about the state of the sport club facilities and request more facilities suitable for people of your age.- Describe your sport club facilities.- What facilities are required?- Explain why people of your age need these facilities.
text: I am writing this letter in regards to the shortage of sports equipment in our city. I just recently moved here with my family and I recently found out that the area doesn't have a huge place where they can play different sports.

I used to play sports with my friends back where I previously lived. It helps me in good shape and be able to bond with people of my age. It also relieves the stress I'm having whenever I'm playing sport.

The local government should pay attention to the entertainment and lifestyle of its residents. The locals need a place where they can relax and have fun with others. The local admin should provide pieces of equipment like balls, tables, nets, rockets and board games, for all types of ages. During these troubled times, people also need to enjoy and be stress-free, it can also help them be physically healthy if facilities are provided for them.
I hope you are considering my request regarding this matter,
